channel.title: Cilium on UltTransformer
channel.description: Recent content in Cilium on UltTransformer

item.title: K8s & Cilium Study Guide
item.description: Kubernetes or K8s is not a new topic in the world of technology, but I feel it’s one that is discussed regularly without a deep level of understanding. As ever, I’m curious to learn how it works, where it can, and more importantly, should be applied, and the architectural decisions that go along with it. For those reasons, I decided to start learning K8s, and more specifically K8s Networking because of my background as a Network Architect.
